text:
mara#tEq pati#H || 
nAhami#ndrANi rAraNaq saKyu#rvRuqShAka#pEr RuqtE | 
yasyEqdamapya(gm)# haqviH priqyaM dEqvEShuq gacCa#ti || 
yO jAqta Eqva pra#thaqmO mana#svAn dEqvO dEqvAn kratu#nA paqryaBU#Shat | 
yasyaq SuShmAqdrOda#sIq aBya#sEtAM nRuqmNasya# maqhnA sa ja#nAsaq indra#H || 
A tE# maqha i#ndrOqtyu#graq sama#nyavOq yath saqmara#ntaq sEnA$H | 
patA#ti diqdyunnarya#sya bAhuqvOrmA tEq - [  ] 48
